title: Garfield Heights Rooftop Reserve
summary: Lightweight rooftop with 18' plunge pool, infrared sauna suite, and vertical olive orchard. Carbon-fiber decking reduced structural load 55%. Hurricane-rated enclosures preserve city views.
outcome: 10-week execution. LEED Platinum. Luxury AirBnB generates $85K/year. 1.5M social media impressions.
